utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh hey! How was your audition?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m sorry, do I know you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nothing, I’m just practicing blowing you off because I’m gonna be a big movie star!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! You got it?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, no not yet. But the audition went really good.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What was it for?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, it’s this big budget period movie about these three Italian brothers who come to America around the turn of the century. It’s really classy! Oh, and the director is supposed to be the next, next Martin Scorcese.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: The next, next?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, there’s this guy from Chicago who’s supposed to be the next Martin Scorcese, all right? But then this guy’s right after him. Hello!

utterance.speaker: Estelle
utterance.content: Joey! It’s Estelle! I just talked to the casting people; they loved you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They loved me!

utterance.speaker: Estelle
utterance.content: Yeah, they wanna see you again tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Estelle
utterance.content: There’s just one thing. Do you have a problem with full frontal nudity?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you kidding me? I never rent a movie without it! Oh. Uh, okay uh let me call you back.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They want me to be totally naked in the movie!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know! My grandmother’s gonna see this!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Grandma’s gonna have to get in line.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey the wedding is so close! Are you getting nervous?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. But a part of me also can’t wait ‘til it’s over. Chandler and I have this pact not to have sex again until the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A no sex pact huh? I actually have one of those going on with every woman in America.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Phoebe, will you give me a hand?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I gotta make up the guest bedroom. Hey, Cousin Cassie is coming to stay with us a few days.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Cassie?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow, I haven’t seen her for like forever. I wonder if she still carries that Barbie everywhere she goes.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross, she’s 25 years old.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So what! I still have—No you’re probably right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs, can I talk to you over here for a second?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Subtle guys!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know you’re planning my surprise bridal shower.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well okay—Well don’t ruin it! Just play along at least!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! We have to throw her a shower?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! What did you decide to do about the movie?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know! It’s not like it’s porn! This is a serious, legitimate movie. Y’know? And the nudity is really important to the story.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s what you say about porn.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You’re right. Maybe I shouldn’t even go on the call back.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! No you should! A lot of major actors do nude scenes! I mean the chance to star in a movie? Come on!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well that’s true. And I am only naked in one scene. Plus it sounds really great. My character’s catholic and he falls in love with this Jewish girl. Who run away together and they get caught in this big rainstorm. So we go into this barn and undress each other and hold each other. It’s really sweet and-and tender.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Plus, everyone’s gonna see your thing.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well when can we have this shower?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She has got so much going on we-we have only two options. We have Friday…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well that’s only two days away. What is the other option?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yesterday!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well if we make it yesterday, woo-hoo! We’re done!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God Phoebe, this is impossible! We can’t do this by Friday! We have to find a place. We have to invite people! We have to get food! There’s just too much to do! It’s impossible! We can’t do it! We cannot do it! We cannot do it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rachel, calm down!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. I’m sorry. You’re right, you’re right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Just calm down woman!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, I already, I already did.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh okay. All right, then I need to calm down a little.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. I think we can do this if we just get organized. All right? We have two days to plan this party. We just need to make fast decisions! Okay? All right, where are we gonna have it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh, here. What time?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: 4 o’clock. Food?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Finger sandwiches and tea.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ooh great! Very Monica.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And chili!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah you went one too far. Uh, flowers or balloons?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Both!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We’re paying for this y’know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Neither.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Umm, what should we do for the theme?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Lusts of the flesh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t know. A cowboy theme?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know I’m-I’m really glad we decided not to sleep together before the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh boy me too!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know I was thinking if we had a…a big fight and uh we broke up for a few hours…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Technically we could have sex again. What do you think, bossy and domineering?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The wedding is off, sloppy and immature!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s me! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. But wait, we can’t. My Cousin Cassie is in the guest room, we’re supposed to have lunch.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well get rid of her, obsessive and shrill.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Shrill?! The wedding is back on!

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: I thought I heard voices. You must be Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi! Nice to meet you!

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: Nice to meet you too.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, are you ready to go?

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’ll be right with you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Cassie needs to stay at your place.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What—why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because Purvry Perverson over here can’t stop staring at her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! Chandler she’s our cousin!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I was not staring at her. Okay? I was just listening intently. It’s called being a good conversationalist. Watch. Say something.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You were staring about eight inches south of there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fine, she can stay at my place. By the way, what-what does Cassie even look like now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She looks exactly like Aunt Marilyn.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Umm, so this Aunt Marilyn is-is-is-is she coming to the wedding?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wafer thin ice!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, I’m back!

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Hi-hi Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh so, will-will I be reading the same scene again?

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Actually, I tried to call to you. You didn’t need to come down here today.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh great! Y’know I would’ve been perfect for this part, but whatever! Y’know, thanks for making a bad decision and ruining your movie! Good day!

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Wait Joey! You didn’t need to come down because the director saw your tape from yesterday and loved it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And scene! Huh? Wasn’t that fun? We did a little improv there. Yeah! Okay! So you-you-you-you were saying?

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Well, the director thinks you’re really right for the part and wants to meet you tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! Sure! That’s great!

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Oh and your agent said you were okay with the nudity.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Yeah sure, just long as it’s handled tastefully and that barn is not too cold.

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Terrific! Well uh, there’s one more thing. Uhh, uh it’s really important to the director that everything in this movie is authentic. Yeah and so in your love scene with Sarah she talks about how she’s never seen a naked man who wasn’t Jewish. So…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So…What?

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: So uh well the director is insisting that whoever play that part be authentically, anatomically not Jewish. Do you know what I’m saying?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. What?

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: An Italian Catholic immigrant at this time would not be…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Barmifsaed?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So to get this part you can’t be?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nope.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But you are?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yep.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But you told them you weren’t?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s right.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! Wow! And it’s definitely all gone? There’s nothing there to work with? What were you thinking?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know! I really want this part! And they tell you no matter what you get asked at an audition you say yes. Like if-if they want you to ride a horse, you tell ‘em you can! And just figure out how to do it later.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey! This is not like learning to ride a horse! This is like learning to…grow a turtleneck!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I kn-I know! I know! Okay? And apparently tomorrow when I go in to meet the director I have to take off my clothes so that they can see what my body looks like.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, what are you gonna do?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I just have to call my agent and tell her I can’t do the part.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Unless!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Unless what?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, this may sound crazy, but there maybe something we could fashion.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Like what?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well I’m not sure yet, but umm of the top of my head I’m thinking double sided tape and some sort of luncheon meat.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! I’ve got a great idea for party favors for the shower. Okay, we get some uh mahogany boxes and carve everyone’s names in them and inside is everyone’s individual birth stone.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. All right, you take care of that. And meanwhile, the party is tomorrow and we still don’t have a guest list.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Okay! Well okay, who do we know that’s coming? Me. Are you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! What’s up Mon?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well uh, I’m trying to make something for Joey. Do you mind if I raid your fridge?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Have at it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. All right, turkey. Eh, that won’t work. Cheese? That won’t work. Olive loaf? I hope that won’t work.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you makin’ him a sandwich?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No it’s umm, more like a wrap. Okay so uh, I’m gonna go guys.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I guess you can get back to deciding on what to get me for a present!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We have to get her a present?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay but look! Look at what I got! It’s her address book! We have a guest list!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God you’re amazing! Did you just pull that out of her purse?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh, and a little seed money for the party.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Cassie?!

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: Hey Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: It’s been so long! Last time I saw you, you were setting up your tent in line to see Return of the Jedi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh. Oh, that’s right. So-so you did see me that day because it seemed like you didn’t.

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: Ah yeah, sorry about that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s okay. Come, come on in.

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: Thanks for letting me stay here! I mean Monica’s place was nice, but her fiancee sure stares a lot.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: Oh my God! You do a great Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-huh. Yeah I-I have a knack for impressions.

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: Well, maybe after we get reacquainted uh, you can do me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah—No!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Cassie, how you-how you doin’ on that…hot dog.

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: I’m all done.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank God.

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: I guess the last time we really hung out was when our parents rented that beach house together.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh right. Right. Ooh, remember the time I uh, I pinned you down and tickled you ‘til you cried? We’re probably too old to do that now.

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: I’ll always remember that summer, because it’s when I got all of these freckles.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-huh! Uh-huh! And-and-and I’ll always remember that summer because that’s when I realized that we are related.

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: It took you that long to figure it out, huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well I’m, I’m a little slow. Just as our children would be.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How are you? Good. Hi, thanks for coming.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Oh thank you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank you. No? All right. Oh, it’s so nice to see you.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: The Other Woman
utterance.content: No thanks.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Hey Rach?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Who the hell are all these people?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I don’t know. I called all the people in Monica’s phone book and these are the only ones who could show up on 24 hours notice.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hmm, y’know there’s another word for people like that. Losers!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! I’m Rachel. This is Phoebe. I’m the maid of honor. How do you know Monica?

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: I was her accountant four years ago.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhhh!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: I’m very interested to find out who’s been doing her taxes these last four years.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s great!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: So, what time is Monica supposed to get here?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse us for a minute. You didn’t tell her to come?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You were supposed to tell her!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No I wasn’t! You were supposed to tell her to come and I was supposed to bring the cake!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Fine, I’ll go call her.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes! And please tell her to bring a cake!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, we have a lot of options here, a number of prototypes for you to try on.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! This looks great!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! Okay, this one is a mushroom cap. Umm, this one is made of bologna.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And-and-and-and-and the toothpicks?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, just until the glue dries.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Now, these are-are more realistic, but perishable.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay? Over here we have pink suede, which is nice. But umm, if it gets wet then you know it’s gonna shrink.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well maybe we just take that one away.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I also, did a little something in fur. But umm, that’s really just for me. Okay. So, why don’t you go into your room and try these on and we’ll see—get a better idea of what’s gonna work.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thanks, you are such a good friend. And this is so weird.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ow!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Toothpick?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you trying on now?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The fruit roll up.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Delicious.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wait a minute! Wait a minute! We have a winner!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! Which one?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The Silly Putty! It’s not so silly anymore!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She’s your cousin. She’s your cousin! If she knew what was going on in your head she’d think you were sick! Or would she? Let’s back up a second. She was the one who suggested opening a bottle of wine. She was the one who turned down the lights. She was the one that wanted to rent Logan’s Run, the sexiest movie ever. Oh, I know that look. Forget it. I want it. She wants it. I’m going in.

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: Hey! What the hell are you doing?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Say something clever! Okay, doesn’t have to be clever, it just has to be words. Say some words. Any words will do. Oh my God! This is the longest that anyone has not talked ever! There is nothing you can say to make this worse!! So just say something!! I-I, I uh haven’t had sex in a very long time. Yeah, you really shouldn’t have said anything.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe! Rachel! It’s Monica! I wonder what you could possibly need me for on such short notice! Oh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Monica, we are so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: For what?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well first, for forgetting to throw you a bridal shower.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And then for forgetting to invite you to it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You al-you already had it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. Well, we called everyone in your phone book and bunch of people came, but it took us so long to get you here that they-they had to leave.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, we wanted to throw you a big surprise and a great shower, and now you don’t have either.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We ruined everything.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well no wait a minute that’s not true! No, what did, that was really sweet. And it kinda works out for the best.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What do you, what do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well now, I get to spend my shower with the only people I really love! I mean, I get all those presents without having to talk to people I don’t even like!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Surprise…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sur-surprise.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: …Monica.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And what’s cool is, the character is from Naples, right?

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: My whole family’s from Naples!

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Oh that’s great! Okay, well I’ve heard everything I need to hear. I just need to uh, Leslie…

utterance.speaker: The Casting Director
utterance.content: Joey, this is awkward part.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Cassie, are you finding everything okay in there?

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: Yeah! Thank you so much for letting me stay here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! No problem! I…

utterance.speaker: Cassie
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Say something! Say anything! Ask her out! She’s not your cousin!
